item.description:
Update: The club website has the incorrect start time. The doors actually open at 9, and the show starts at 10pm. I plan to get there around 9:30.

Come out this Tuesday and join us at 21 Daniel St for a live punk music show! Featured acts include:
The Shutdown ( on tour from Milwaukee ww.myspace.com/theshutdownrnr)
The Black Noise Scam
West Rockers
The Hulls ( DEBUT show feat: Kevin MacKenzie, Matt Gawel, Jess Corbett & John Meah)

Cost: 5$
Doors open at 9, show starts at 10. I'll probably be there around 8:45.
Car pooling from New Haven is available.

More details can be found at:
http://www.facebook.c...

See you there!
-Neil
203-645-2008
item.name: Die Hipster! Records Punk Show
